column5: My place is located in the heart of historic downtown Marble Falls,within walking distance to boutique shops, great restaurants & live music . Lake Marble Falls is just 5 blocks away for lake activities. Great hiking & nearby wineries. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the ambiance, the comfy queen bed & the private bath with romantic slipper tub. Open the french doors to the private deck, where you can enjoy spectacular sunsets. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers.
column8: Lovely Private Room in Historic Marble Falls Home
